ema 5% api noyek kanda walata beduwama,sthri mandasarubhawaya 50% witharapurusha mandasarubhawaya 30% witharahethuwak nomathi mandasarubhawaya 20% withara thamayi api dakke.namuth oba puduma weyi ada thathwaya gana ada wenakota me agayan boho wenas wela.2000 warshaya wenakota me agayan sthri mandasarubhawaya 40%purusha manda sarubhawaya 50%hethuwak nomathi mandasarubhawaya 10% lesa wenas wuna.nawathath 2006di lokaya me gana soya baluwa.
